programme.title: Kung Fu Traveler 2
programme.desc: Gen. Chen goes back in time to the late Qing Dynasty to find the master of the northern style of kung fu.

programme.title: Brothers Till We Die
programme.desc: When a robbery goes sideways, two crooks set out to teach their backstabbers a lesson.

programme.title: Colt 38 Special Squad
programme.desc: The city of Turin is in the grip of a brutal crime boss known as the Marseillaise, and plenty of cops have good reason to want him dead but none more than Inspector Vanni.

programme.desc: A half-Indian gunfighter returns to his hometown to find it ravaged by plague and menaced by outlaws.

programme.desc: A holy man (Dolph Lundgren) and an archaeologist (Francoise Robertson) seek a key that will stop a demon from releasing the Antichrist.
